bio: I suffer from a form of Cerebral Palsy called Worster-Drought Syndrome. I also have severe Dyspraxia. I have a love of tech and gadgets, also love my voluntary work Center for Contemporary Music, Mills College - Oakland, CA Graduate studies... computer and electronic music, input languages for composers and performance.
